headline: Warren Buffett Says Goodbye Today With 65% of Berkshire Hathaway in 5 of His Favorite Stocks
summary: Despite Warren Buffett’s departure, these five dividend stocks are likely to stay in the Berkshire Hathaway portfolio for decades to come.
